pageContext.claim: “And somebody is doing a fantastic job and tells us we're really pretty far ahead, maybe way ahead. You know they had a poll. I think it was a Gallup poll. They said 62% of the people are lying about their poll.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has trailed Biden in the polls for months. The poll he is referencing was a collaboration between The Hill and Harris Research. It found 66 percent of people said it is likely “that a significant number of people lie when taking political surveys.” Critically, the poll is asking what people think others, which is different than asking if those people are not truthful to pollsters.
